channel.title: Comments on: Equipping Vim for JavaScript
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: meshugunner
item.dc:creator: meshugunner
item.description:
I use this mapping
:nnoremap -; mw$a;`w
-; appends a semicolon to the end of the line without losing your position in the line.
item.content:encoded:
I use this mapping

:nnoremap -; mw$a;`w

-; appends a semicolon to the end of the line without losing your position in the line.

item.title: By: Costa Michailidis
item.dc:creator: Costa Michailidis
item.description: Having trouble customizing colors. How do I customize the colors of various js language features. Like right now, the highlighting of require in node is the same as strings, and that's just confusing.
item.content:encoded: Having trouble customizing colors. How do I customize the colors of various js language features. Like right now, the highlighting of require in node is the same as strings, and that’s just confusing.

item.title: By: Avinash
item.dc:creator: Avinash
item.description:
I keep coming back to this every time create a new VM or project. Thanks again @OliverCaldwell:disqus ! Just a pointer to a dead link on the page :
"... Now you are going to want to install jelera/vim-javascript-syntax by adding this to your .vimrc (or dedicated bundle file <> as I have)."
item.content:encoded:
I keep coming back to this every time create a new VM or project. Thanks again @OliverCaldwell:disqus ! Just a pointer to a dead link on the page :

“… Now you are going to want to install jelera/vim-javascript-syntax by adding this to your .vimrc (or dedicated bundle file <> as I have).”

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description: That's excellent! I hope it's proving useful :) with regards to repeating, do you have tpope/vim-repeat? That tends to help but there are some situations that aren't perfect. I find it works perfectly for most cases, but I could just be lucky!
item.content:encoded: That’s excellent! I hope it’s proving useful ðŸ™‚ with regards to repeating, do you have tpope/vim-repeat? That tends to help but there are some situations that aren’t perfect. I find it works perfectly for most cases, but I could just be lucky!

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description: I'm now only using pangloss/vim-javascript, which appears to be the best. You're probably right in that they may have conflicted. I'm also using mxw/vim-jsx for modern JavaScript things.
item.content:encoded: I’m now only using pangloss/vim-javascript, which appears to be the best. You’re probably right in that they may have conflicted. I’m also using mxw/vim-jsx for modern JavaScript things.

item.title: By: Avinash
item.dc:creator: Avinash
item.description: Thanks for the wonderful post. I shared this with my entire team, and our dev environment now includes most of the plugins your page mentions. I guess the only thing I find not be working quite satisfactorily is the '.' or the 'redo' command in vim. I am assuming it is probably due to 'delimitmate'.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the wonderful post. I shared this with my entire team, and our dev environment now includes most of the plugins your page mentions. I guess the only thing I find not be working quite satisfactorily is the ‘.’ or the ‘redo’ command in vim. I am assuming it is probably due to ‘delimitmate’.
